impact_assessments.title: New START Nuclear Treaty Expires
primary_impacts: Unconstrained nuclear arsenal expansion by US and Russia
Collapse of post-WWII arms control architecture
Nuclear proliferation risk cascade to other states
secondary_impacts: New arms race with China entering as third nuclear peer
Erosion of non-proliferation regime (NPT under stress)

impact_assessments.title: EPA Eliminates Clean Air Act Endangerment Finding
primary_impacts: Legal basis for all federal GHG regulation removed
EPA authority to regulate CO2 as pollutant eliminated
Reversal of Obama-era and Biden-era climate policies
secondary_impacts: State-level climate litigation surge as federal backstop disappears
International climate credibility collapse (Paris Agreement commitments)

impact_assessments.title: Microsoft Majorana 1 Topological Quantum Chip
primary_impacts: Potential solution to decoherence -- the core barrier to practical quantum computing
New architectural paradigm for fault-tolerant qubits
Microsoft leap ahead in quantum hardware race
secondary_impacts: Drug discovery and materials science revolution timeline compressed
National security implications for code-breaking capability

impact_assessments.title: Geoeconomic Confrontation Named World's Top Risk 2026
primary_impacts: Paradigm shift: economic tools as primary instruments of geopolitical confrontation
Supply chain weaponization becoming normalized
Tariff-sanction spiral risk assessment threshold breached

impact_assessments.title: Baby KJ: First Personalized CRISPR Gene-Editing Treatment
primary_impacts: Opens era of bespoke genetic medicine -- treatment designed for individual patient
Proof of concept for personalized gene therapy at clinical scale
Regulatory precedent for individualized therapies
secondary_impacts: Insurance and healthcare cost model disruption
Equity and access concerns for ultra-personalized medicine

impact_assessments.title: FDA Clears First Human Trial of Epigenetic Reprogramming
primary_impacts: First-ever human clinical trial of anti-aging gene therapy using Yamanaka factors
Potential to reverse age-related cellular damage (not just slow aging)
Regulatory pathway established for rejuvenation therapies
secondary_impacts: Pension and retirement system disruption if lifespan extends

impact_assessments.title: China Clean Energy Drives 1/3 of GDP Growth
primary_impacts: Clean energy as economic growth engine -- not just environmental policy
Solar/wind surpassing coal: structural irreversibility signal
China as dominant clean energy superpower
secondary_impacts: Global fossil fuel stranded asset risk acceleration
Clean tech supply chain geopolitics intensification
Developing country energy transition pathway model

impact_assessments.title: ILO: Global Jobs Gap Reaches 408 Million in 2026
primary_impacts: 408M global jobs gap exposes failure of standard unemployment metric
2.1B workers in informal economy without protection -- systemic vulnerability
Gender gap: women 24.2% less likely in labor force
secondary_impacts: AI displacement amplification of existing job quality crisis

impact_assessments.title: Gold Breaches $5,000
primary_impacts: Historic gold price signals structural loss of confidence in fiat currencies
Fed pivot expectations driving massive monetary policy repricing
Safe haven demand reflecting geopolitical risk premium
secondary_impacts: Central bank gold accumulation accelerating de-dollarization
Mining sector and resource nationalism implications

impact_assessments.title: Global CBDC Race Accelerates
primary_impacts: Multiple major economies simultaneously launching digital currencies
Monetary infrastructure modernization at global scale
Cross-border payment disruption

impact_assessments.title: AI-Assisted Engineers Learn 25% Less
primary_impacts: Empirical evidence: AI assistance degrades human learning (50% vs 67% mastery)
Fundamental challenge to AI-augmented workforce paradigm
Training vs productivity trade-off quantified

impact_assessments.title: Cerebras Raises $1B for AI Chip Alternative
primary_impacts: Wafer-scale AI chip as fundamental alternative to GPU architecture
$23B valuation signals investor conviction in Nvidia disruption
AI compute diversification reducing single-vendor dependency
secondary_impacts: Geopolitical implications for chip supply chain

impact_assessments.title: Sodium-Ion Batteries Emerging as Lithium Alternative
primary_impacts: Salt-based batteries could break lithium supply chain dependency
Cheaper energy storage democratizing grid and EV access
Reduced critical mineral geopolitical tensions

impact_assessments.title: Jimmy Lai Sentenced to 20 Years
primary_impacts: Definitive end of 'one country, two systems' in practice
Landmark press freedom case with global chilling effect
Foreign nationals charged under NSL -- extraterritorial reach precedent
secondary_impacts: International business confidence erosion in Hong Kong

impact_assessments.title: Climate Models Missing Key Ocean Player
primary_impacts: Systematic bias in climate projections if plankton dissolution omitted
Carbon cycle budget calculations potentially incorrect
Ocean chemistry understanding fundamentally incomplete
secondary_impacts: Climate policy targets may need recalibration

impact_assessments.title: US Jobs: Structural Labor Market Transformation
primary_impacts: Demographic contraction: US to add only 23M in 30yr vs 70M previous 30yr
Older workers extending careers while younger generation disengaging
Immigration decline compounding labor supply crisis
secondary_impacts: Automation adoption acceleration as labor shortage response

impact_assessments.title: Mechanistic Interpretability: 2026 Breakthrough
primary_impacts: First systematic approach to understanding AI model internal reasoning
Shift from black-box to transparent AI possible
AI safety research enabled at mechanistic level
secondary_impacts: Regulatory compliance for AI systems facilitated

impact_assessments.title: ~800 New Deep-Sea Species Found Before Mining
primary_impacts: Biodiversity discovery in mining-targeted areas creates urgent conservation tension
37% animal decline and 32% species reduction in mined areas documented
Critical mineral demand vs biodiversity conservation dilemma

impact_assessments.title: Global Energy Storage to Exceed 100GW in 2026
primary_impacts: Energy storage milestone enables higher renewable penetration
EV sales overtaking petrol in EU (Dec 2025) -- transportation electrification
90%+ of new renewables cheaper than fossil fuels

impact_assessments.title: NASA Perseverance AI-Driven Autonomous Navigation
primary_impacts: AI-generated waypoints reduce Earth-Mars communication dependency
450m autonomous drive demonstrates practical AI-rover integration
Template for future autonomous exploration (lunar, asteroid)
secondary_impacts: Reduced human oversight for planetary operations

impact_assessments.title: Stanford Optical Cavities Enable Scalable Quantum Networking
primary_impacts: Miniature optical cavities enable simultaneous multi-qubit reading
Scalable quantum networking with hundreds of cavities demonstrated
Stanford architecture complements Microsoft topological approach

impact_assessments.title: AI Trustworthiness: Operational Necessity
primary_impacts: Shift from aspirational principles to mandatory operational requirements
Autonomy threshold legislation being considered
Human oversight levels becoming legally defined

impact_assessments.title: EU Targets Meta Over AI Assistants (DMA)
primary_impacts: DMA enforcement expanding to AI-level platform gatekeeping
Platform-embedded AI assistants as new competition law frontier
Meta required to enable rival AI assistants on WhatsApp
secondary_impacts: Big Tech AI integration strategies constrained

impact_assessments.title: US Judge Rules Secret Climate Panel Unlawful
primary_impacts: Judicial check on executive climate policy manipulation
Scientific advisory process integrity defended
DOE Secretary Wright's handpicked panel ruled illegal
secondary_impacts: Future administration climate science interference deterred
Federal advisory committee transparency standards strengthened

impact_assessments.title: WHO: 40% of Cancer Cases Preventable
primary_impacts: 40% prevention rate identified across 30 causes including 9 infections
Public health priority reframing from treatment to prevention
Cost-effectiveness argument for prevention investment
secondary_impacts: Vaccination program expansion for cancer-causing infections

impact_assessments.title: H-2B Visa Expanded: +64,716 for FY2026
primary_impacts: Persistent labor shortage in seasonal industries confirmed by policy response
Immigration policy tension: expansion vs restriction rhetoric
Temporary worker dependency deepening

impact_assessments.title: Portugal: Center-Left Defeats Far-Right
primary_impacts: Counter-trend to European far-right surge
Center-left viability demonstrated in populist era
Portuguese democratic resilience signal

impact_assessments.title: Artemis II Delayed to March
primary_impacts: Hydrogen leak delays first crewed lunar mission since Apollo 17
SLS reliability concerns for Artemis program timeline
Commercial alternatives (SpaceX Starship) competitive pressure
secondary_impacts: Space tourism and commercial crew momentum

impact_assessments.title: US Patent Applications Drop 9%
primary_impacts: Innovation output declining after record highs
Samsung leading with 7,054 grants (+11% YoY) -- East Asian dominance
Cell-related technology surging +23% over 4 years

impact_assessments.title: Deep-Sea Chiton Named by Public Vote
primary_impacts: Citizen science engagement growing -- 8,000 naming submissions
Science communication democratization via social media (YouTube)
Public awareness of deep-sea biodiversity increasing
